doc.previous: Topography has been applied to different science fields In neuroscience the neuroimaging discipline uses techniques such as EEG topography for brain mapping In ophthalmology corneal topography is used as a technique for mapping the surface curvature of the cornea In tissue engineering atomic force microscopy is used to map nanotopography
doc.after: In human anatomy topography is superficial human anatomy
